title: Enhancing Memory Recall in LLMs with Gauss-Tin: A Hybrid Instructional and Gaussian Replay Approach
summary: Despite the significant advancements in Large Language Models (LLMs), catastrophic forgetting remains a substantial challenge, where models lose previously acquired knowledge upon learning new information. Continual learning (CL) strategies have emerged as a potential solution to this problem, with replay-based techniques demonstrating superior performance in preserving learned knowledge.
